Series.Actors: |Benjamin McKenzie|Robin Lord Taylor|Cory Michael Smith|Donal Logue|Camren Bicondova|David Mazouz|Sean Pertwee|Tonya Pinkins|Nathan Darrow|B.D. Wong|Michael Chiklis|Drew Powell|Chris Chalk|Anthony Carrigan|Colm Feore|Cameron Monaghan|Jessica Lucas|James Frain|Nicholas D’Agosto|Morena Baccarin|Carol Kane|Clare Foley|Victoria Cartagena|Jada Pinkett Smith|Andrew Stewart Jones|John Doman|Erin Richards|Zabryna Guevara|Ben McKenzie|
Series.Overview: An action-drama series following rookie detective James Gordon as he battles villains and corruption in pre-Batman Gotham City.

Episode.Overview: Everyone knows the name Commissioner Gordon. He is one of the crime world’s greatest foes, a man whose reputation is synonymous with law and order. But what is known of Gordon’s story and his rise from rookie detective to Police Commissioner? What did it take to navigate the multiple layers of corruption that secretly ruled Gotham City, the spawning ground of the world’s most iconic villains? And what circumstances created them – the larger-than-life personas who would become Catwoman, The Penguin, The Riddler, Two-Face and The Joker?
Go behind the scenes of the upcoming new FOX TV series "Gotham," from its comic book origins to the "cutting edge" production. Hear from all the key players both behind and in front of the camera.
Robin Lord Taylor discusses the aftermath of Gotham and how his character, Oswald, has evolved.
Ben McKenzie discusses the aftermath of GOTHAM and how his character has changed from the beginning of season 1.
Cory Michael Smith discusses the aftermath of GOTHAM and his excitement for the conflicts his character is dealing with.
Erin Richards discusses the aftermath of the GOTHAM Season One Finale.
David Mazouz and Sean Pertwee discuss their excitement of the unveiling of the cave and the aftermath of the GOTHAM Season One Finale.

Episode.GuestStars: |John Doman|Richard Kind|Victoria Cartagena|Andrew Stewart-Jones|Drew Powell|Daniel Stewart Sherman|Michael Kostroff|Grayson McCouch|Brette Taylor|Clare Foley|Victor Cruz|Jon Beavers|
Episode.Overview: Detective James Gordon performs his work in the dangerously corrupt city of Gotham, which consistently teeters between good and evil.

Episode.GuestStars: |Lili Taylor|Richard Kind|Drew Powell|Wayne Duvall|Kyle Massey|Joe Starr|Joseph Latimore|Carol Kane|Frank Whaley|
Episode.Overview: Detectives Gordon and Bullock investigate a child trafficking ring preying on Gotham's street kids, including Selina Kyle. Penguin resurfaces in the countryside and begins to make his way back to Gotham.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Zayas|Dan Bakkedahl|Clark Middleton|James Colby|Jack Koenig|Michelangelo Milano|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock track down a vigilante who uses weather balloons to kill corrupt citizens; Cobblepot gets a job close to a major figure in the underworld.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Zayas|Richard Kind|Drew Powell|Hakeem Kae-Kazim|Makenzie Leigh|Danny Mastrogiorgio|Brad Calcaterra|Evander Duck Jr.|
Episode.Overview: Politicians on both sides of the Arkham district issue are in danger as the vote approaches; Gordon gets a visit from an old friend.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Zayas|Makenzie Leigh|Danny Mastrogiorgio|Daniel London|Kett Turton|Genevieve Hudson-Price|Peter Maloney|Sharon Washington|Jeremy Davidson|Margaret Colin|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock search for the source of a new street drug that causes euphoria then death. Oswald Cobblepot works his way deeper into Maroni's inner circle. Fish Mooney continues to plot against Falcone.

Episode.GuestStars: |Susan Misner|Christopher James Baker|Kim Director|Brian O'Neill|Carol Kane|Dan Hedaya|
Episode.Overview: When a killer begins targeting the first born of Gotham's elite, Bullock is forced to confront traumatic memories from a nearly identical case he worked in the past. Gordon is confronted by past decisions.

Episode.GuestStars: |David Zayas|Richard Kind|Drew Powell|Jeremy Davidson|Makenzie Leigh|Danny Mastrogiorgio|Anthony Carrigan|Mekia Cox|
Episode.Overview: As violence between Maroni and Falcone continues to escalate, Penguin reveals a new element of his manipulative strategy, forcing Gordon to deal with the consequences of his decision to spare Penguin’s life.

Episode.GuestStars: |Todd Stashwick|Makenzie Leigh|Cole Vallis|Frank Deal|Orlagh Cassidy|Carol Kane|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock investigate a Gothamite who runs a deadly fight club for candidates applying for a job at his financial firm. Meanwhile, Bruce returns to school and gets a visit from a new friend.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nicholas D'Agosto|Richard Kind|Drew Powell|Makenzie Leigh|Al Sapienza|Leslie Odom Jr.|Steve Cirbus|Luke Forbes|
Episode.Overview: Trying to close the Wayne murder case, a young Harvey Dent and Gordon team up, much to Mayor James’ chagrin. Meanwhile, Penguin makes contact with Mooney’s secret weapon, Liza.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nicholas D'Agosto|Richard Kind|Drew Powell|Makenzie Leigh|Al Sapienza|Clare Foley|Lesley-Ann Brandt|Devin Harjes|Kyle Massey|John Enos III|Frank Liotti|
Episode.Overview: Selina leads a new friend on a perilous journey through Gotham to evade the assassins who are on her trail. Following a misstep, Gordon is reassigned to duty at Arkham Asylum.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Drew Powell|Allyce Beasley|Isiah Whitlock Jr.|Kyle Massey|Christopher Heyerdahl|Kevin McCormick|Anthony Grasso|
Episode.Overview: Gordon’s assignment at Arkham Asylum gets off to a rocky start when the murder of a guard ignites an investigation, leading him to meet Dr. Leslie Thompkins. Meanwhile, Cobblepot continues to build his army.

Episode.EpisodeName: What the Little Bird Told Him
Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Drew Powell|Christopher Heyerdahl|Anthony Carrigan|Kevin McCormick|Dash Mihok|Peter Scolari|Adrian Martinez|Caroline Lagerfelt|Richard Poe|
Episode.Overview: In an attempt to get his job back, Gordon seeks to capture Jack Gruber, a deranged electrical genius who escapes Arkham Asylum. Meanwhile, Falcone struggles to hold onto his empire after Fish Mooney makes her next move.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Drew Powell|Anthony Carrigan|Carol Kane|Dash Mihok|Niko Nicotera|
Episode.Overview: When the key witness in a homicide ends up dead while being held for questioning by the police, Gordon suspects that it’s an inside job and looks to an old friend for information. Meanwhile, Oswald Cobblepot takes control of one of Fish Mooney’s prized possessions, as she gets a small taste of her own medicine.

Episode.GuestStars: Morena Baccarin
Episode.Overview: Fish Mooney reveals a secret of Oswald Cobblepot's, prompting Maroni to take him on a trip to test his loyalty. Meanwhile, Gordon and Bullock hunt down a killer who targets victims with severe phobias and Bruce Wayne confronts Gordon for failing to make progress on his parents' murder case.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Babs Olusanmokun|Eisa Davis|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock set out to stop Gerald Crane, a biology teacher who has been harvesting the glands of his murder victims. Meanwhile, after finding herself in an unusual setting, Mooney continues plotting to gain power, and Falcone attempts to change Maroni's plan for the Penguin. Then, Bruce takes a treacherous hike.

Episode.GuestStars: |Drew Powell|Morena Baccarin|Carol Kane|Anthony Carrigan|Dashiell Eaves|James Monroe Inglehart|Robert Gorrie|Abbi Snee|Cameron Monaghan|
Episode.Overview: Gordon takes Dr. Leslie Thompkins to the circus, but the day turns quickly when the circus comes under attack. Then, Falcone enlists Butch Gilzean to help Penguin with the night club, while Fish Mooney is otherwise occupied. Also, Bruce Wayne schedules a meeting with the Wayne Enterprises board.

Episode.GuestStars: |Drew Powell|Clare Foley|Sharon Washington|David O'Hara|Jonny Coyne|Takeo Lee Wong|
Episode.Overview: Following several bank robberies, Gordon and Bullock investigate the Red Hood gang. Selina Kyle continues to bond with Barbara, and Fish Mooney tries to reclaim her position in the underworld.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nicholas D'Agosto|Peter Scolari|Chelsea Spack|Michael J. Burg|Perry Yung|Colm Feore|Dan Ziskie|Becky Ann Baker|Nicholle Tom|Zachary Spicer|Dashiell Eaves|Elliot Villar|
Episode.Overview: While Gordon seeks information about the recent controversy with Commissioner Loeb, Fish’s allegiance with the prisoners is questioned when she appears to join forces with Dr. Dulmacher. Meanwhile, after an attack close to home, Bruce deals with the aftermath.

Episode.GuestStars: |Peter Scolari|Morena Baccarin|Colm Feore|David O'Hara|Dashiell Eaves|Milo Ventimiglia|Willa Fitzgerald|PJ Griffith|Brendan Griffin|Barbara Rosenblat|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock inspect a cold case involving the Ogre, a serial killer who targets young women in Gotham City. Meanwhile, Fish plots her escape from the Dollmaker, and Bruce and Selina confront Reggie.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Milo Ventimiglia|Drew Powell|David Zayas|Chelsea Spack|Carol Kane|Clark Carmichael|Laurence Mason|Zachary Spicer|Michael McCormick|Daniel Davis|Michael Potts|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock continue their investigation of the Ogre, who begins to make his move on someone close to Gordon. Meanwhile, Bruce and Selina team up to expose a corrupt Wayne Enterprises employee and Nygma comes to Kristin Kringle’s defense.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Milo Ventimiglia|Drew Powell|David Zayas|Chelsea Spack|Clark Carmichael|Caroline Lagerfelt|Richard Poe|Michael Potts|Barbara Rosenblat|Chris Chalk|James Andrew O’Connor|Tonya Glanz|April Yvette Thompson|
Episode.Overview: The Ogre breaks down Barbara’s emotions, while Gordon and Bullock go to great lengths to track him down. Meanwhile, Penguin leads a massacre, beginning an epic war, while Bruce learns the truth about Wayne Enterprises and Nygma deals with his recent actions.

Episode.GuestStars: |Morena Baccarin|Drew Powell|David Zayas|Peter Scolari|Chelsea Spack|Dashiell Eaves|James Andrew O’Connor|
Episode.Overview: As Gotham City’s gang war reaches its boiling point, Fish Mooney goes head-to-head with Maroni and Penguin in an attempt to re-stake her claim on the city. Meanwhile, Barbara and Leslie Thompkins are brought together after recent events, and Bruce searches Wayne Manor for any hints that his father might have left behind.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Damned If You Do...
Episode.GuestStars: |Drew Powell|Peter Scolari|Anthony Carrigan|James Andrew O'Connor|David Fierro|Cameron Monaghan|Todd Stashwick|Will Brill|Stink Fisher|Dustin Ybarra|Otto Sanchez|Philip Goodwin|
Episode.Overview: Penguin is King of Gotham and after a shakeup at the GCPD, Detective James Gordon's moral compass wavers, as he seeks help from Penguin. Meanwhile, Bruce Wayne continues to explore the secrets from his father's office, and Gotham newcomers Theo Galavan and his sister, Tabitha, make friends with some unlikely allies - a group of dangerous inmates from Arkham.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Knock, Knock
Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Kind|Chelsea Spack|Cameron Monaghan|Will Brill|Stink Fisher|Dustin Ybarra|Thom Sesma|Maria Thayer|
Episode.Overview: On the heels of his reinstatement, Gordon is thrust onto the high-profile case tracking the deadly inmate escape from Arkham Asylum. Meanwhile, Galavan plans his next move, while Bruce asks for help from his fathe's old friend to unlock the secrets in his office, and Nygma asks out Kristin Kringle on a date.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: The Last Laugh
Episode.GuestStars: |Cameron Monaghan|Mark Margolis|Norm Lewis|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock track down a nemesis from the past, leading to a standoff between Jerome and Gordon. Meanwhile, a magic show at the Gotham Children's Hospital gala turns into a hostage situation.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Strike Force
Episode.GuestStars: |Carol Kane|Anthony Carrigan|Chelsea Spack|Saundra Santiago|Michael Mulheren|Natalie Alyn Lind|Danny Johnson|Lenny Platt|Paulina Singer|Ian Quinlan|Lucas Salvagno|
Episode.Overview: Captain Barnes is called to duty to create a law-abiding task force, with the help of Gordon. Meanwhile, Penguin gets caught up in a favor for Galavan, and Nygma asks Kringle out on a date.

Episode.GuestStars: |Chelsea Spack|Lenny Platt|Paulina Singer|Ian Quinlan|Lucas Salvagno|Michael Potts|Michelle Veintmilla|Leo Fitzpatrick|Noah Robbins|Mary Joy|Ron Rifkin|
Episode.Overview: Galavan and Penguin join forces with a dangerous family in Gotham. Then, as the rivalry between the Waynes and the Galavans resurfaces, Gordon struggles to maintain order in the city.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: By Fire
Episode.GuestStars: |Carol Kane|Clare Foley|Chelsea Spack|Natalie Alyn Lind|Paulina Singer|Ian Quinlan|Lucas Salvagno|Michelle Veintimilla|Leo Fitzpatrick|
Episode.Overview: After Bridgit Pike rejoins her brothers, a new spark of courage ignites within her, as she chooses to take control of her future. Meanwhile, Kringle and Nygma's relationship will take a new step and Penguin and Galavan continue to battle for control of Gotham City's underworld.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Mommy's Little Monster
Episode.GuestStars: |Carol Kane|Anthony Carrigan|Chelsea Spack|Natalie Alyn Lind|Ian Quinlan|Lucas Salvagno|
Episode.Overview: Butch leads Penguin and his men to the warehouse where Gertrude is being held, as Penguin plots his revenge on Galavan for kidnapping his mother. Meanwhile, Nygma deals with the aftermath of a deadly accident.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Tonight's the Night
Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Kind|Natalie Alyn Lind|Ian Quinlan|
Episode.Overview: Galavan sends Barbara after Jim Gordon, while he tries to make a business deal with Bruce Wayne. Barnes and Bullock are hot on Barbara's trail, and Nygma has a run-in with a familiar face.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: A Bitter Pill to Swallow
Episode.GuestStars: |Natalie Alyn Lind|Michelle Gomez|Jon Sklaroff|Raul Castillo|Ron Rifkin|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Barnes continue cleaning up Gotham, and Gordon comes face-to-face with one of the city's most dangerous hitmen, Eduardo Flamingo. Meanwhile, Nygma and Penguin cross paths again, and Bruce pressures Galavan into handing over the name of his parents' murderer.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: The Son of Gotham
Episode.GuestStars: |Richard Kind|Ellen Harvey|Natalie Alyn Lind|Ron Rifkin|Tommy Flanagan|
Episode.Overview: Gordon confronts a suspect who is connected to Galavan, but falls short of obtaining any information. Meanwhile, Bruce gets one step closer to discovering the name of his parent's killer.

Episode.EpisodeName: Rise of the Villains: Worse Than A Crime
Episode.GuestStars: |Nathan Darrow|Natalie Alyn Lind|Ron Rifkin|
Episode.Overview: When Bruce Wayne is kidnapped, Gordon must look to some unlikely and dangerous allies for help. It is a battle of the villains, and not everyone makes it out alive.

Episode.EpisodeName: Wrath of the Villains: Mr. Freeze
Episode.GuestStars: |Nathan Darrow|Kristen Hager|BD Wong|Tonya Pinkins|John Pirkis|Danny Hoch|
Episode.Overview: Penguin takes a hit for Galavan's murder, but doesn't let Gordon off easily. Meanwhile, Gordon and Bullock investigate the body-snatching spree of Victor Fries, one of Gotham's preeminent cryogenics engineers.

Episode.EpisodeName: Wrath of the Villains: A Dead Man Feels No Cold
Episode.GuestStars: |Nathan Darrow|Kristen Hager|BD Wong|Ian Quinlan|Tonya Pinkins|
Episode.Overview: As Gordon, Bullock and Barnes continue the search for Victor Fries, they are forced to look to his wife, Nora, for help. Meanwhile, Penguin is introduced to Hugo Strange, and Alfred reveals some crucial information to Bruce about his parents' murderer.

Episode.EpisodeName: Wrath of the Villains: This Ball of Mud and Meanness
Episode.GuestStars: |Carol Kane|BD Wong|Stink Fisher|Ian Quinlan|Tonya Pinkins|Jamar Greene|Lori Petty|Michael Bowen|
Episode.Overview: Alfred and Selina help Bruce on his quest to find his parents' killer, Matches Malone. Meanwhile, Gordon follows up with Edward Nygma on Kristen Kringle's whereabouts and Hugo Strange continues his treatment to reduce Penguin's aggression.

Episode.EpisodeName: Wrath of the Villains: Mad Grey Dawn
Episode.GuestStars: |Paul Reubens|Clare Foley|Ian Quinlan|Jerry Dixon|Paul Pilcz|Melinda Clarke|Justin Mark|Kaley Ronayne|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bullock investigate a trail of clues left in a museum robbery, which, unbeknownst to them, were left by Nygma in a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse. Meanwhile, Gordon's past comes back to haunt him when an anonymous person threatens to expose his hand in Galavan's murder. Also, Penguin's visit to some old friends leads him to meet his father, Elijah Van Dalh, and Bruce practices his street smarts.

Episode.GuestStars: |Paul Reubens|Clare Foley|Ian Quinlan|Jerry Dixon|Paul Pilcz|Melinda Clarke|Justin Mark|Kaley Ronayne|
Episode.Overview: After Gordon is removed from protective custody, he begins to face new threats and dangers inside prison walls. In order to survive, he must rely on a new friend, as well as Bullock and other outside help. Meanwhile, Penguin grows closer to his father, while his step-mother and step-siblings move forward with their own plans for the family.

Episode.EpisodeName: Wrath of the Villains: Into the Woods
Episode.GuestStars: |BD Wong|Tonya Pinkins|Melinda Clarke|Justin Mark|Kaley Ronayne|
Episode.Overview: In an attempt to clear his name, Gordon steals his case file and approaches Nygma for help. Meanwhile, Penguin discovers his step-family's role in his father's death, and awakens from his conditioning.

Episode.GuestStars: |Nathan Darrow|BD Wong|Tonya Pinkins|Michelle Gomez|Julia Taylor Ross|
Episode.Overview: After leaving Arkham Asylum, Barbara attempts to make amends with Gordon. Then, Bruce and Alfred track down one of Thomas Wayne's former friends from Project Chimera, but Hugo Strange disrupts their plans.

Episode.GuestStars: |BD Wong|Tonya Pinkins|Stink Fisher|
Episode.Overview: Gordon and Bruce question Professor Strange about Project Chimera, which leads Strange to send the newly resurrected Galavan to confront Gordon. Meanwhile, Nygma investigates who Professor Strange is.

Episode.GuestStars: |BD Wong|Tonya Pinkins|Michelle Veintimilla|
Episode.Overview: Azrael is on the loose in Gotham City, which sparks Penguin's need for revenge. Meanwhile, Bruce enlists the help of Selina Kyle to help track down Professor Strange, as he evades arrest for his experiments.
